code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{BsPlus,BsEyeFill}from"react-icons/bs";import{CartContext}from"../contexts/CartContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useContext(CartContext);const{id,image,category,title,price}=product;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border border-[#e4e4e4] h-[300px] mb-4 relative overflow-hidden group transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full h-full flex justify-center items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-[200px] mx-auto flex justify-center items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"max-h-[160px] group-hover:scale-110 transition duration-300",src:image,alt:""})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"absolute top-6 -right-11 group-hover:right-5 p-2 flex flex-col justify-center items-center gap-y-2 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-all duration-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product,id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center text-white w-12 h-12 bg-teal-500",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BsPlus,{className:"text-3xl"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(id),className:"w-12 h-12 bg-white flex justify-center items-center text-primary drop-shadow-xl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BsEyeFill,{})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tex-sm capitalize text-gray-500 mb-1",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-semibold mb-1",children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"font-semibbold",children:["$ ",price]})]})]});};export default Product;
